00032 CoreMethods::CoreMethods()
00033 {
00034     ;

00037 QString CoreMethods::getWhichOut(QString fileName){
00038     /*
00039      * Getting 'whitch' output;
00040      */
00041 
00042     proc = new QProcess(this);
00043 
00044     QStringList args;
00045 
00046     args<<fileName;
00047 
00048     proc->setWorkingDirectory (QDir::homePath());
00049     proc->start("/usr/bin/which", args, QIODevice::ReadOnly);
00050     proc->waitForFinished();
00051 
00052     QString string = proc->readAllStandardOutput();
00053     delete proc;
00054 
00055     if (!string.isEmpty()){
00056         return string.trimmed();
00057     }
00058 
00059     return "";
00060 }
00061 
00062 QString CoreMethods::getPrefixPath(QString prefixName, bool check_exists){
00063     /*
00064      * Getting prefix path by its name
00065      */
00066 
00067     //Check if FakeDive exists?
00068     QString prefixPath;
00069     QSqlQuery query;
00070     query.prepare("SELECT path FROM prefix WHERE name=:name");
00071     query.bindValue(":name", prefixName);
00072     if (!query.exec()){
00073         qDebug()<<"SQL Error: CoreMethods::getPrefixPath"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
00074         query.clear();
00075         return "";
00076     }
00077     query.first();
00078     prefixPath = query.value(0).toString();
00079     query.clear();
00080 
00081     if (prefixPath.isEmpty()){
00082         prefixPath = QDir::homePath();
00083         prefixPath.append("/.wine");
00084     }
00085 
00086     if (check_exists){
00087         QDir fake_dir (prefixPath);
00088         if (!fake_dir.exists()){
00089             QMessageBox::warning(0, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specified prefix %1 directory not exists.").arg(prefixPath), QMessageBox::Ok);
00090                 return "";
00091         }
00092     }
00093 
00094     return prefixPath;
00095 }

00097 QString CoreMethods::getSettingValue(QString group, QString key){
00098     /*
00099      * Getting setting key value
00100      */
00101 
00102     QString value;
00103 
00104     QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
00105 
00106     settings.beginGroup(group);
00107         value = settings.value(key).toString();
00108     settings.endGroup();
00109 
00110     return value;
00111 }

00113 WisItem  CoreMethods::getWisInfo(QString fileName) {
00114     WisItem obj; //to return
00115 
00116     QFile file (fileName);
00117     if (!file.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly)) {
00118         qDebug()<<tr ("cannot open file ") + file.fileName() + tr (" because ") + file.errorString();
00119         obj.error = true;
00120         return obj;
00121     }
00122 
00123     QXmlStreamReader reader (&file);
00124         
00125         reader.readNext(); //startDocument
00126     qDebug() << "first" << reader.tokenString(); //it is
00127         reader.readNext(); //q4wine_pack
00128         qDebug() << "q4wine_pack";
00129 
00130     while (!reader.atEnd()) {
00131         if (reader.hasError()) {
00132             qDebug () << tr ("File format error!");
00133             break;
00134         }
00135                 qDebug()<<reader.readNext();
00136                 if (!reader.isWhitespace()){
00137                     QString name, text;
00138                     name = reader.name().toString();
00139                     text = reader.readElementText().trimmed();
00140 
00141                     
00142                     qDebug()<< tr ("Token detected:  '%1' contains '%2'").arg(name).arg(text);
00143                     
00144                     if (name == "q4wine_pack"){
00145                         qDebug () << tr ("Q4wine package");
00146                     }
00147 
00148                     if (name == "name"){
00149                         qDebug () << tr ("name");
00150                         obj.name = text;
00151                     }
00152 
00153                     if (name  == "author"){
00154                         qDebug () << tr ("author ") + text ;
00155                         obj.author = text;
00156                     }
00157                     if (name == "description"){
00158                         qDebug () << tr ("description of package");
00159                         obj.description = text;
00160                     }
00161 
00162                     if (name == "download"){
00163                         qDebug () << tr (" download URL");
00164                         obj.download = text;
00165                     }
00166 
00167                     if (name == "site"){
00168                         qDebug () << tr ("site");
00169                         obj.site = text;
00170                     }
00171 
00172                     if (name == "install"){
00173                         qDebug () << tr ("install path");
00174                         obj.install = text;
00175                     }
00176 
00177                     if (name == "contact"){
00178                         qDebug () << tr ("contact info");
00179                         obj.contact = text;
00180                     }
00181                 }
00182     }
00183     file.close();
00184     return obj;
00185 }
